ModMetadata.Name: Compass Mod
ModMetadata.Author: lorexcold
ModMetadata.Description:
[h1]Compass Mod[/h1] [b]WARNING:[/b] This is a Stationeers Launchpad Plugin Mod. It requires BepInEx to be installed with the Stationeers Launchpad plugin. Installation Guide: [url=https://github.com/StationeersLaunchPad/StationeersLaunchPad?tab=readme-ov-file#fresh][/url]
This mod adds a functional Compass UI to the game, showing your current heading at the top-center of the screen.
[h2]Features[/h2] [list] [*]Top-center compass display [*]Displays current heading in degrees [*]Humans & Zrillians need to wear a helmet to see the compass HUD. [/list]
[h2]Requirements[/h2] [list] [*]StationeersLaunchPad with BepInEx installed. [/list]
[h2]Extra Credits[/h2] [list] [*]Thyra | Suggested we make the hud disappear when helmet is open or when not wearing one. [*]Tallinu | Reported back that hud wasn't working for robots not wearing helmets [/list
ModMetadata.ChangeLog: [h3]Version 1.0.3[/h3] [list] [*]Made it so robots don't need to wear a helmet to see the compass HUD. [/list]
